text: Casablanca Records is an American recording label.Larry Alan Harris, And Party Every Day: The Inside Story of Casablanca Records (New York: Backbeat Books, 2009), p. 263 It is owned by Universal Music Group. Casablanca operates under Republic Records. The label became most successful as a disco label in the 1970s. It currently operates as an electronic dance music label under the direction of Tommy Mottola. == References == Category:American record labels
title: Casablanca Records
